00079 /* Log message, compiler specific */
00080 #ifdef __orxGCC__
00081 
00082   #define orxLOG(STRING, ...)                                                                                     \
00083   do                                                                                                              \
00084   {                                                                                                               \
00085     _orxDebug_Log(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_LOG, (const orxSTRING)__FUNCTION__, __FILE__, __LINE__, STRING, ##__VA_ARGS__);  \
00086   } while(orxFALSE)
00087 
00088   #define orxLOG_CONSOLE(STRING, ...)                                                                             \
00089   do                                                                                                              \
00090   {                                                                                                               \
00091     _orxDebug_BackupFlags();                                                                                      \
00092     _orxDebug_SetFlags(orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_CONSOLE                                                          \
00093                       |orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_TYPE                                                             \
00094                       |orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_TIMESTAMP,                                                       \
00095                        orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_MASK_USER_ALL);                                                       \
00096     _orxDebug_Log(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_LOG, (const orxSTRING)__FUNCTION__, __FILE__, __LINE__, STRING, ##__VA_ARGS__);  \
00097     _orxDebug_RestoreFlags();                                                                                     \
00098   } while(orxFALSE)
00099 
00100   #define orxLOG_FILE(STRING, ...)                                                                                \
00101   do                                                                                                              \
00102   {                                                                                                               \
00103     _orxDebug_BackupFlags();                                                                                      \
00104     _orxDebug_SetFlags(orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_FILE                                                             \
00105                       |orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_TYPE                                                             \
00106                       |orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_TIMESTAMP,                                                       \
00107                        orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_MASK_USER_ALL);                                                       \
00108     _orxDebug_Log(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_LOG, (const orxSTRING)__FUNCTION__, __FILE__, __LINE__, STRING, ##__VA_ARGS__);  \
00109     _orxDebug_RestoreFlags();                                                                                     \
00110   } while(orxFALSE)
00111 
00112 #else /* __orxGCC__ */
00113   #ifdef __orxMSVC__
00114 
00115     #define orxLOG(STRING, ...)                                                                                   \
00116     do                                                                                                            \
00117     {                                                                                                             \
00118       _orxDebug_Log(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_LOG, (const orxSTRING)__FUNCTION__, __FILE__, __LINE__, STRING, __VA_ARGS__);  \
00119     } while(orxFALSE)
00120 
00121     #define orxLOG_CONSOLE(STRING, ...)                                                                           \

00124       _orxDebug_BackupFlags();                                                                                    \
00125       _orxDebug_SetFlags(orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_CONSOLE                                                        \

00128                          orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_MASK_USER_ALL);                                                     \
00129       _orxDebug_Log(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_LOG, (const orxSTRING)__FUNCTION__, __FILE__, __LINE__, STRING, __VA_ARGS__);  \
00130       _orxDebug_RestoreFlags();                                                                                   \
00131     } while(orxFALSE)

00153   /* Debug print, compiler specific */
00154   #ifdef __orxGCC__
00155     #define orxDEBUG_PRINT(LEVEL, STRING, ...)  _orxDebug_Log(LEVEL, (const orxSTRING)__FUNCTION__, __FILE__, __LINE__, STRING, ##__VA_ARGS__)
00156   #else /* __orxGCC__ */
00157     #ifdef __orxMSVC__
00158       #define orxDEBUG_PRINT(LEVEL, STRING, ...)  _orxDebug_Log(LEVEL, (const orxSTRING)__FUNCTION__, __FILE__, __LINE__, STRING, __VA_ARGS__)
00159     #endif /* __orxMSVC__ */
00160   #endif /* __orcGCC__ */
00161 
00162   /* End platform specific */

00164   #define orxDEBUG_ENABLE_LEVEL(LEVEL, ENABLE)_orxDebug_EnableLevel(LEVEL, ENABLE)

00167   #define orxDEBUG_BACKUP_FLAG()              _orxDebug_BackupFlags()
00168   #define orxDEBUG_RESTORE_FLAG()             _orxDebug_RestoreFlags()
00169 
00170   /* Break */
00171   #define orxBREAK()                          _orxDebug_Break()
00172 
00173   /* Files */
00174   #define orxDEBUG_SETDEBUGFILE(FILE)         _orxDebug_SetDebugFile(FILE)
00175   #define orxDEBUG_SETLOGFILE(FILE)           _orxDebug_SetLogFile(FILE)
00176   #define orxDEBUG_SETBASEFILENAME(FILE)                      \
00177     do                                                        \
00178     {                                                         \
00179       orxCHAR   zBuffer[256];                                 \
00180       strncpy(zBuffer, FILE, 256);                            \
00181       strncat(zBuffer, orxDEBUG_KZ_DEFAULT_DEBUG_SUFFIX, 256);\
00182       _orxDebug_SetDebugFile(zBuffer);                        \
00183       strncpy(zBuffer, FILE, 256);                            \
00184       strncat(zBuffer, orxDEBUG_KZ_DEFAULT_LOG_SUFFIX, 256);  \
00185       _orxDebug_SetLogFile(zBuffer);                          \
00186     } while(orxFALSE)
00187 
00188   /* Assert */
00189   #ifdef __orxGCC__
00190     #define orxASSERT(TEST, ...)                                                                  \
00191       if(!(TEST))                                                                                 \
00192       {                                                                                           \
00193         orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_ASSERT, "[Assertion failed] : <" #TEST ">", ##__VA_ARGS__); \
00194         orxBREAK();                                                                               \
00195       }
00196   #else /* __orxGCC__ */
00197     #ifdef __orxMSVC__
00198       #define orxASSERT(TEST, ...)                                                                \
00199         if(!(TEST))                                                                               \
00200         {                                                                                         \
00201           orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_ASSERT, "[Assertion failed] : <" #TEST ">", __VA_ARGS__); \
00202           orxBREAK();                                                                             \
00203         }
00204     #endif /* __orxMSVC__ */
00205   #endif /* __orcGCC__ */
00206 
00207 #else /* __orxDEBUG__ */
00208 
00209   #define orxDEBUG_PRINT(LEVEL, STRING, ...)
00210 
00211   #define orxBREAK()
00212 
00213   #define orxDEBUG_ENABLE_LEVEL(LEVEL, ENABLE)_orxDebug_EnableLevel(LEVEL, ENABLE)
00214 
00215   #define orxDEBUG_SETDEBUGFILE(FILE)
00216   #define orxDEBUG_SETLOGFILE(FILE)           _orxDebug_SetLogFile(FILE)
00217   #define orxDEBUG_SETBASEFILENAME(FILE)                      \
00218     do                                                        \
00219     {                                                         \
00220       orxCHAR   zBuffer[256];                                 \
00221       strncpy(zBuffer, FILE, 256);                            \
00222       strncat(zBuffer, orxDEBUG_KZ_DEFAULT_LOG_SUFFIX, 256);  \
00223       _orxDebug_SetLogFile(zBuffer);                          \
00224     } while(orxFALSE)
00225 
00226   #define orxASSERT(TEST, ...)
00227 
00228   #define orxDEBUG_SET_FLAG(SET, UNSET)       _orxDebug_SetFlags(SET, UNSET)
00229   #define orxDEBUG_BACKUP_FLAG()              _orxDebug_BackupFlags()
00230   #define orxDEBUG_RESTORE_FLAG()             _orxDebug_RestoreFlags()

00232 #endif /* __orxDEBUG__ */

00250 {
00251   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_ANIM = 0,

00277   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_CRITICAL_ASSERT,             
00279   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_NUMBER,
00280 
00281   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_MAX_NUMBER = 32,
00282 
00283   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_ALL = 0xFFFFFFFE,            
00285   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_NONE = orxENUM_NONE
00286
